changes: Initial release of lomi. - The open-source payment processing platform powering West African businesses.
Support for one payment method: Wave Mobile Money.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Transparent fees at a 20% discount vs. competition.
pricing.introduction: We only earn when you do — no surprises, no hidden fees, no monthly costs.
pricing.transparency: No surprises, no hidden fees, no monthly costs

calculator.disclaimer: Estimates are calculated based on your average transaction amount and volume.
calculator.fee_tooltip: Includes processing, merchant of record, fraud prevention and global compliance taxes and fees.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Answers to common questions about lomi.'s payment processing services.
faq.introduction: Find answers to the most common questions about using lomi. for your payment needs.
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.

pricing.question: How does lomi. pricing work?
pricing.answer: lomi. offers transparent pricing with no hidden fees. We charge a simple 2.9% fee per transaction plus a small fixed fee depending on the currency. There are no setup fees, monthly fees, or hidden charges.

funds.question: When can I receive my funds?
funds.answer: Funds are typically available for withdrawal within 2 business days after a payout is completed.

payment_methods.question: What payment methods do you support?
payment_methods.answer: We support major credit and debit cards, and mobile money across multiple African countries.

minimum_amount.question: Is there a minimum transaction amount?
minimum_amount.answer: No, there is no minimum transaction amount. You can process payments of any size through our platform.

security.question: How secure is lomi.?
security.answer: lomi. uses industry-standard security protocols and is fully compliant with PCI DSS requirements for card payments processing. We employ encryption, tokenization, and other security measures to protect your data and your customers' information.

international.question: Can I use lomi. for international transactions?
international.answer: Yes, lomi. supports international transactions. We can process payments in multiple currencies, including USD and XOF.

card1.title: All your preferred payment methods
card1.description: Accept local and international payment methods, seamlessly.

card2.title: A checkout experience that converts
card2.description: Create a fast, powerful, and secure payment flow.
card2.description_light: Increase your revenue and keep customers coming back.

card3.title: Your imagination is the limit
card3.description: From products to subscriptions to usage billing, we got you covered.

card4.title: Instant and effortless payouts
card4.description: Withdraw your earnings directly to your mobile money or bank account in seconds.
card4.payout_phone: Payout as much as you need to your phone number
card4.payout_bank: or directly to your local or international bank account

card5.title: See what sticks with powerful analytics
card5.description: Monitor revenue, track transactions, and plan your next move with our powerful dashboard.

card6.title: Made possible by YOU
card6.description: Open-source, 100% powered by passion and the open-source community.
card6.open_source_note: Fully open-source and actively maintained by contributions.

careers.title: An open-source software company focused on removing payment barriers.
